snippet: Defenseman Radko Gudas scored on a deflected shot in the third period, and the surging Philadelphia Flyers beat the Blackhawks, 3-2, in Chicago to move into position for a wild-card playoff spot.
abstract: Philadelphia Flyers beat Chicago Blackhawks, 3-2; other hockey news noted.
lead_paragraph: Defenseman Radko Gudas scored on a deflected shot in the third period, and the surging Philadelphia Flyers beat the Blackhawks, 3-2, in Chicago to move into position for a wild-card playoff spot.
